description:
The investment seeks to replicate as closely as possible, before fees and expenses, the price and yield performance of the S&P Green Bond Select Index (the "index").
 The fund normally invests at least 80% of its total assets in securities that comprise the fund's benchmark index. The index is comprised of bonds issued for qualified "green" purposes and seeks to measure the performance of green-labeled bonds issued globally. The fund is non-diversified.
